text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/CodeSystem/C4BBPayerAdjudicationStatus defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
innetwork In NetworkIndicates the claim or claim line was paid in network. This does not indicate the contracting status of the provider
outofnetwork Out Of NetworkIndicates the claim or claim line was paid out of network. This does not indicate the contracting status of the provider
other OtherIndicates other network status or when a network does not apply
contracted ContractedIndicates the provider was contracted for the service
noncontracted Non-ContractedIndicates the provider was not contracted for the service

name: C4BBPayerAdjudicationStatus
title: C4BB Payer Adjudication Status
description: Describes the various status fields used when payers adjudicate a claim, such as whether the claim was adjudicated in or out of network, if the provider was contracted or non-contracted for the service

concept.definition: Indicates the claim or claim line was paid in network.  This does not indicate the contracting status of the provider
Indicates the claim or claim line was paid out of network.  This does not indicate the contracting status of the provider
Indicates other network status or when a network does not apply
Indicates the provider was contracted for the service
Indicates the provider was not contracted for the service
